review: Great doc. Sorted out my issue within 20 minutes. I'm happy with the result, and would recommend the team to anyone requiring dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent job done. Dr. Bandish was detailed in his diagnosis and explained the procedure each step of the way. X rays and records have been stored in soft copy and a patient can see their entire history in photos and x rays anytime they like. 
The post operative care was explained in detail which helped quicken the healing process and remove any anxiety. 
Biggest plus point being that Dr. Bandish is easily approachable for queries and information and the clinic is modern and super well maintained.

Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Bandish Parekh is professional and friendly. I went to his Matunga Clinic regarding cavity and pain problem in my tooth (including RCT as told to me by 2 other Dentists earlier who were overcharging me for RCT and tooth filling). I found him over Practo only. He explained everything in detail to me before beginning with the treatment and, trust my words, it was painless and he knew exactly what he was doing, on top of that he saved my tooth as he explained my tooth didn't needed the RCT which overall saved me money, tooth and time as well. He is someone I would recommended everyone to visit if having any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My family and I have been visiting since the past 10years and we have had a wonderful experience with him as our dentist. He has taken the utmost care with each of us and has instilled great confidence in us over the years with his very kind approach to something as gruelling and nightmarish as dental checkups. His systematic and methodical nature as well as high regard for hygiene must be applauded. It must be noted that he also ensures all measures to make sure that the patient on his chair is comfortable at all times whether it is with the actual procedures ongoing or the ambience of the room which is always jolly. We recommend him a 100% for any dental issues.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your kind words. So nice of you to write such a wonderful review. Inspires me to serve and work better.
After all, you both are my favorite people.  :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Bandish Parekh is professional & quite friendly... His clinic is well equipped... Me and my family have been trusting him fully with our dental care... Procedures are well explained and treatment is top-notch... He is operating with all necessary precautions and provided us with his services even in the ongoing pandemic...  As soon as you reach his Clinic, there is foot pedal operated sanitizer outside & then provided with disposable shoe covers, headcovers & gloves... Also, the temperature check is done... He & his entire staff follow the required social distancing and wear a medical safety kit... Patients can expect treatment under a safe clinical practice...

I read reviews about Dr. Bandish Parekh before I underwent treatment for my root canal. i obviously had a lot of apprehensions on what I would have to go through during the procedure. To my good fortune I made the right decision to undergo root canal by Dr. Parekh. After analyzing my tooth condition he patiently explained to me what was best to do and also explained the procedure and that at the max 2 session would be required. It was absolutely PAINLESS. His knowledge about the subject was detailed. the clinic is modern and has latest instruments. I strongly recommend to consult Dr. Bandish Parekh if you have any dental problems.
reply_text: Thank You Mr. Desai for such a detailed and nice review.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is very polite and friendly doctor I would recommend my family and friends to also visit there ..

I went to Dr. Parekh's clinic for root canal and cavity treatment. Dr. Parekh is a young, experienced, and extremely professional doctor. He's the most thorough dentist I've worked with; he explains every step of the procedure, using the latest camera and x-ray technology, and he has a very reassuring voice that instantly makes you feel at ease. After the procedure, he checked in with me  a couple of times to make sure everything is ok and has been accessible even after it. This is a great testament to his professionalism and passion for his job. I would highly recommend Dr. Parekh to the Practo community!
reply_text: Wow Pratap that was really heartfelt. Thanks a lot for this detailed and wonderful review. I pledge that i will continue serving everyone with the same professionalism.

review:
Dental treatment always use to be a fearsome experience. However this experience with doctor Parekh was extremely good. He took really good care and kept guiding on the treatment so I knew what was happening. Explained every step with was great. Moreover the cleanliness and the advanced technology he is using actual made the experience exciting and interactive. I will definitely come to only him here on for all dental concerns.

Even after treatment care and follow-up was amazing. Thank you so much doctor.

This was my fourth visit to this clinic and so  far had the best experience.   My root canal procedure was done in just one sitting and the pain was quite manageable. The doc was extremely thorough and clear on what she was doing every step of the way.The technology allowed me to see the pre and post treatment.I also consulted with the doc about a cosmetic procedure. What  I appreciate here is that they don't push you for any procedures even if they suggest them. 
Also, I have never waited more than 5 minutes  for my name to be called in and to  get started on. 
I would definitely recommend this clinic. The peppy music in the background n the expertise of the doc would calm down even a nervous patient.
Thank you for a pleasant experience.

review: Doctor was very helpful and explained the problem very much in detail. Would surely recommend others.
Nice and friendly doc....helps with solution and good and latest technology available..would suggest to my family and friends for dental
Did a cleaning. The experience was excellent. The doctor is thorough, patient and open to questions and suggestions. Would be definitely visiting again for all my dental woes!
very good. the doctor helps by explaining the procedures and the problems.
One of the most experienced Professional i have come accross
reply_text: Thank you so much Mr. Malagi. I must say you are also one of the most cooperative patients i have come across.

review: Good experienced doctor....picked the excat root cause....advice the correct treatment...
Very Good. Plan to go back for other dental issues. will certainly recommend to my acquaintances.

Doctor Parekh explained me the entire process and the scaling was done within a reasonable time with utmost efficiency. He also helped me to understand the need to care of our teeth on a regular basis.
The doctor is super chill. Made sure I was comfortable and gave information about what he's doing and what he'll  do next. I recommend visiting c:
I went for a second opinion as first doctor suggested a root canal. He identified the right cause and avoided unnecessary treatments.
It was the best experience. He has guide me with proper treatment and did a good treatment. Would like to recommend him to my friends and family
Great Experience. The doctor is extremely communicative and keeps you informed at every step. You feel at ease sitting the dentist's chair that someone like Dr. Bandish is treating you.
Fast effective single visit rootcanal. Thorough professional!! Definitely coming back for my remaining treatment :)

Very nice, I feel Bandish is a very talented Doctor for his age, his ability to look at perfection at his work is very overwhelming, he also ensure that he does regular follow ups with patients regularly for their dental well being.
Had gone for wisdom tooth removing. Was very professional, on time, and very thorough. Even explained the procedure in detail before extraction.
Extremely professional. Very caring. Also has a light hand which is a must for any dentist. Didn't know when the procedure was over.
For great result please visit Dr. Parekhs dental clinic. I have got my rootcanal done and always thought they were very pain but for the treatment with them my view changed. Thanks Dr. Parekh

Very professional and honest. Visited this clinic for a second opinion and decided to get my treatment done here only.  He Saved my tooth from a root canal. I can't be more happy. Thanks Dr. Bandish. God bless you.
Well equipped clinic with profficient & specialist  doctors. The treatment was very comfortable, careful and well explained. Recommended for all types of dental treatment..

The experience was very pleasant and the treatment rendered to me was the finest I have got from any of the clinics I have ever visited. An exceptional high level of professionalism was maintained,all in all the  perfect experience.

HE is an excellent doctor. I loved the way  he handled and treated me . i am a very bad patient i yell and hit my dentist. but this time i didnt even know when he finished my cavity... the best  dentist ever.
Great young doctor who took the time and effort to explain everything to my satisfaction. The procedures were also pain free and not uncomfortable at all

Transparency is the key to his success. While working on his patients, he keeps on telling what is being done and what he is going to do next. Promptness in carrying out his job is his another virtue.
It was good. I received good advice and am definitely planning to go back. The place was clean and had good equipments. Overall, it was a good experience.
